entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
